amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Overseas Contingency Operations (OCO) account by $16.8 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to decrease funding for the Overseas Contingency Operations (OCO) account by $16.8 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 307 (Roll no. 459).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 115 - 307 (Roll no. 459).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
